charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C): Distribution of and possession with intent to distribute cocaine base(1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: committed to custody of BOP for a term of 84 months on each count to run concurrent; 3 years supervised release on each count to run concurrent; $200 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C): Possession with intent to distribute cocaine base(3)

charges.charge_disposition: committed to custody of BOP for a term of 84 months to run concurrent with term imposed in Counts 1-2; 3 years supervised release to run concurrent with term imposed in Counts 1-2; $100 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1): Possession with intent to distribute cocaine base
